channel.title: Combat
channel.description:
im currently using a pi/dspk source and client but i have a probleme
whenever i go to train my stats like strenght attack or defence and i get level up but its dont show at my player level like im at level 3 and i have like 50 str after i logout and i relogin its will be fine but its not updating after my str level up how i can fix that?

item.title: Combat
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

Combatx:

I guess you’re using something like deathlypvpz i’ve fixed this many times its to do with your formulas for combat skills and summoning.

nop im using pi dspk exilium im working on that project now can u please tell me how to fix or we can do it from skype?

Read full topic

item.title: Combat
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

I guess you’re using something like deathlypvpz i’ve fixed this many times its to do with your formulas for combat skills and summoning.

item.title: Combat
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I think you can only update the combat level through the player updating block (or by setting the interface text - you can find the id by using lins interface editor).

Read full topic
